title: 2 Easy Ways to Put League of Legends in Windowed Mode

steps.title: Start the game.
steps.content: Start the game. Press “Esc” to bring up the Settings window.

steps.title: Click the “Video” tab.
steps.content: Click the “Video” tab. Select “Windowed” rather than “Fullscreen” or “Borderless.”

steps.title: Resume play.
steps.content: Resume play. You can toggle between fullscreen and windowed modes while playing by using the shortcut Alt+Enter. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Open the League of Legends folder on your computer.
steps.content: Open the League of Legends folder on your computer. The default location is C:\Riot Games\League of Legends.

steps.title: Open the “Configuration” folder.
steps.content: Open the “Configuration” folder. Open Game.cfg in Notepad.

steps.title: Find where it says, “WindowMode=1.”
steps.content: Find where it says, “WindowMode=1.” Change the 0 to 1. Save the file.

steps.title: Start up the game.
steps.content: Start up the game. It should be in windowed mode. Adjust the screen resolution to make the window smaller. You may have to restart the game to apply these changes.
